- At turn 10, the player is at \(y = 7\). Freeway 7 has a car with span \([-19, -8]\) at turn 10 (calculated as \([-23 + 4 \times (10-9), -12 + 4 \times (10-9)] = [-19, -8]\)), and 0 is not in this span, so no collision occurs. The action \(U\) moves the player to \(y = 8\) for turn 11.
